original_text: You think that you are better than other people. And so you believe something that is not true. You live in a place that is difficult to reach. Your home is high up in a place among rocks. You say to yourself, “Nobody can reach us up here.” You think that you are better than other people. And so you believe something that is not true. You live in a place that is difficult to reach. Your home is high up in a place among rocks. You say to yourself, “Nobody can reach us up here.” You think that you are better than other people. And so you believe something that is not true.
korean_text: 너의 마음의 교만이 너를 속였도다 바위 틈에 거주하며 높은 곳에 사는 자여 네가 마음에 이르기를 누가 능히 나를 땅에 끌어내리겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: You think that you are better than other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다른 사람들보다 자신이 더 낫다고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: And so you believe something that is not true.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 참되지 않은 것을 믿습니다.

sentences.original_text: You live in a place that is difficult to reach.
Your home is high up in a place among rocks.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 집은 바위 사이의 높은 곳에 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: You think that you are better than other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다른 사람들보다 자신이 더 낫다고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: And so you believe something that is not true.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 참되지 않은 것을 믿습니다.

sentences.original_text: You live in a place that is difficult to reach.
Your home is high up in a place among rocks.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 집은 바위 사이의 높은 곳에 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: You think that you are better than other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다른 사람들보다 자신이 더 낫다고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: And so you believe something that is not true.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 참되지 않은 것을 믿습니다.
